area_raw: all squares that contain plants in a 5-foot burst
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Ranger's Bramble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1871)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 384 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Area** all squares that contain plants in a 5-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of [_entangling flora_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1515). A creature that critically fails the save takes 2d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) in addition to being [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24). Escaping your bramble doesn't end the bleed damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The bleed damage on a critical failure increases by 1d4.
name: Ranger's Bramble

summary_markdown: You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of [_entangling flora_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1515).
text: Ranger's Bramble Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 384 2.0 Range 100 feet Area all squares that contain plants in a 5-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of entangling flora . A creature that critically fails the save takes 2d4 persistent bleed damage in addition to being immobilized. Escaping your bramble doesn't end the bleed damage. --- Heightened (+1) The bleed damage on a critical failure increases by 1d4.
